Name: Neon Nights Pinball
About the game: Neon Nights Pinball is an exciting eight flipper table featuring two upper play fields supporting seven primary missions, two skill shots and of course multi ball. One exciting new feature is STEAM leaderboard support! This cyber punk styled machine blasts a catchy, pulse pounding, nine minute custom soundtrack that will keep the action rolling. Newly updated version 1.4 features full controller support. For a detailed photo guide of how to complete missions and general information including basic controls visit the online manual found here : Please note: This title has been tested in standard 1920 x 1080 and 2560 x 1600 HD resolution, any other resolution has not been tested and may possibly crop off parts of the screen. This title does feature flashing lights, it is a pinball table after all, so those with any medical conditions that may be triggered by flashing lights please consider this before purchase and if you experience any symptoms while playing immediately stop playing and consult a doctor right away.
